00064 class QCOMMANDLINE_EXPORT QCommandLine : public QObject
00065 {
00066   Q_OBJECT
00067 public:
00071     typedef enum {
00072         None = 0, 
00073         Switch, 
00074         Option, 
00075         Param 
00076     } Type;
00077 
00081     typedef enum {
00082         Default = 0, 
00083         Mandatory = 0x01, 
00084         Optional = 0x02, 
00085         Multiple = 0x04, 
00086         MandatoryMultiple = Mandatory|Multiple,
00087         OptionalMultiple = Optional|Multiple,
00088     } Flags;
